name: WorkingMomTipoftheDay
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Welcome to the Working Mom Tip of the Day. You'll get daily tips, tricks, and advice on how to save time and your sanity while striking a better balance. Topics cover time management, planning and scheduling, meetings management, lists, meal preparation, logistics, setting goals, mindfulness, gratitude, and more, more, more. As a working mom, you have dozens of competing priorities. Your Working Mom Tip of the Day is the little spark of inspiration you need to be more effective and get more done. For more in-depth tips, working mom stories, and laughs, visit robincamarote.com. Have an idea you'd like to share? Contact me at robin@robincamarote.com. You got this, mama!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
